original_text: They would save me. But then the things that God has said in the Bible about this would not happen. So it must happen in this way.’
korean_text: 내가 만일 그렇게 하면 이런 일이 있으리라 한 성경이 어떻게 이루어지겠느냐 하시더라

sentences.original_text: the things that God has said in the Bible about this
sentences.korean_translation: 이것에 대해 성경에서 하나님이 말씀하신 것들이

sentences.original_text: So it must happen in this way.
